Text: Re API for Enron Onlineis another request for a direct EOL data feed We should figure out how we want to respond to such inquiries I have never heard of this company before Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM Graham Mansfield AM To cc Subject Re API for Enron Online Good Day to you I would like to introduce myself and my company Kalahari Ltd is a UK based software company that has for the past years been supply pricing software to the Financial Markets Over the past year we have been branching out into the energy markets and are currently working for a number of UK based Electricity companies One such company London Electricity has asked us to produce software to filter and highlight online trading prices This allows them to see ONLY the best price in the market for any one product at a time This is due to the sudden explosion of internet based price delivery systems To enable us to acieve their requirements we require an API to the relative online trading systems Today I spoke to a gentlemen in your call centre who gave me your contact details Could you please advise me if you do indeed publish an API to your internet trading platform and if so how do I go about getting it We would of course be prepared to sign a non disclosure agreement in this respect I look forward to hearing from you in due course With kind regards Graham Mansfield Deputy Managing Director Kalahari Limited Tel Fax wwwkalaharicouk The information in this Internet email is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for the addressee Access to this Internet email by anyone else is unauthorised and any disclosure copying distribution or any action taken or omitted to be taken in reliance on it is prohibited and may be unlawful Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where they are stated to be the views of Kalahari Ltd

RE Dow Jones Energy Service password via wwwdjnewsnetprepare another confidentiality agreement for the entity listed below two sided thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM Beveridge Francesca on AM To Dave Samuels cc Subject RE Dow Jones Energy Service password via wwwdjnewsnet Hello David The corporate entity and address are as follows Dow Jones Company Inc N Pearl Street Suite Dallas TX I will forward the confidentiality agreement to my legal department in NJ Many thanks fb Original Message From Dave Samuels mailto Sent Thursday March PM To Beveridge Francesca Subject Re Dow Jones Energy Service password via wwwdjnewsnet Thanks for sending this information I would be happy to send a draft of a confidentiality agreement Can you please send me the name of the corporate entity that would be signing this ie Dow Jones Inc and the business address Thanks Dave

Confidentiality Agtare some comments back from Dow Jones I am happy to discuss if so desired thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM Beveridge Francesca on PM To cc Subject Confidentiality Agt Dear David I am forwarding to you the confidentiality agreement after my legal department made a few changes Please let me know if the changes are acceptable to you Best regards fb Enronblkdoc Enronblkdoc

new agreementsHere are the entities for the next two confidentiality agreements Energy Argus Inc Washington Street Suite Hoboken NJ British Entity PH Energy Analysis Ltd Ingram House John Adam Street London WCN LD United Kingdom They should both be bilateral agreements Thanks Dave

RE Confidentiality Agtis the contact for Dow Jones Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM Beveridge Francesca on PM To Dave Samuels cc Subject RE Confidentiality Agt Hello David I have been out of the office at a meeting Sorry that I couldnt turn this around earlier today My contact in legal is Michele Leflar She can be reached at Her email address is I do not have Michelles fax number at this time but can get it to you tomorrow I have left a message for Michelle so that she will be expecting the call from your legal department I dont know if this can be resolved by AM central time but we can certainly try Looking forward to meeting you fb Original Message From Dave Samuels mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Beveridge Francesca Cc Tana Jones Subject Re Confidentiality Agt My lawyer wanted to speak with your lawyer to discuss these comments further and try to reach an agreement Can you please provide a name and phone and fax number so that they can speak Thanks Dave Beveridge Francesca on PM To cc Subject Confidentiality Agt Dear David I am forwarding to you the confidentiality agreement after my legal department made a few changes Please let me know if the changes are acceptable to you Best regards fb Enronblkdoc See attached file Enronblkdoc

Re List of EnronOnline Confidentiality Agreements I thought financial times was signed by the counterparty Enron North America Corp From Tana Jones PM To Rahil CT Dave CT Julie CT cc Subject List of EnronOnline Confidentiality Agreements Attached is an updated list of the Confidentiality Agreements

Re List of EnronOnline Confidentiality Agreements thanks for following this up Dave Enron North America Corp From Tana Jones PM To Dave CT cc Subject Re List of EnronOnline Confidentiality Agreements We do have it signed However the Companys name was not correct in the agreement so I spoke to Wayne Greenberg and it said it was okay to go ahead and change the name on the CA he signed and I just wanted to get a copy back from him initialled by the name change so we have a record of his agreement

Confidentiality Agreementis one more agreement If you could please review the comments they have made and if OK obtain a signature within Enron and then fax to them for their return signature thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM on AM To cc Subject Confidentiality Agreement Dave The approved confidentiality agreement is attached below As you can see there are just a couple of small change Steven and I will call you at three to talk a little more about commercial arrangements If theres any headcounts you can send over before then ie the number of people trading on and visiting the site plus those with readonly access that would be helpful Regards Peter Ogram Manager Fieldston Publications See attached file confagreedoc confagreedoc

EnronOnlinecomREVISED DOCUMENTSForwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM Stanford Lin on PM To cc Lynne Carithers James Garland Phil Lynch Subject EnronOnlinecomREVISED DOCUMENTS EnronReuters Working Group Attached please find revised copies of the Order Forms and Terms Conditions Please note the following changes as discussed with Enron this afternoon NEWS ORDER FORM Order Form No The Base Service Fees have been modified to reflect k per month in year and k thereafter References to April have been changed to April DATA ORDER FORM Order Form No Page numbers have been inserted at the top left of each page References to April have been changed to April pages and The date of termination by Enron has been changed from September to September The fee waiver for the first year of quotes has been dropped see page sec reflecting the fact that has been reduced from the News Order Form in the first year TERMS CONDITIONS Section The term is now defined as months from the st day of the month following the Initial Billing Date Section In order to make the language consistent between the Terms Conditions and the Order Forms the term Minimum Charges has been replaced with Base Service Fees If these changes are satisfactory to the parties then we may prepare copies for execution See attached file EnronInvestorTC docSee attached file EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm docSee attached file EnronInvestorDataOrderForm doc Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorTC doc EnronInvestorNewsOrderForm doc EnronInvestorDataOrderForm doc
NDAfor the delay The company is marchFIRST West th Street New York NY the contact name is Pamela Sprayragen her phone number is her fax number is thanks Dave

Re New CAs Revised Listcomment the Platts agreement has been completed I have a copy signed by both sides please let me know if you need a copy of this thanks Dave From Tana Jones on PM To Dave CT Julie CT Rahil CT Bob CT cc Teresa nron Mark CT Carol St CT Subject New CAs Revised List We have received the following two executed Confidentiality Agreements Dow Jones Company Inc dated May Cysive Inc dated May Copies will be sent to Dave Samuels I am also attaching a revised copy of the Online Confidentiality Agreement List Please let me know if you have any comments or questions on the list

ndaa while since we have done one of these but heres a new one This will need to be bilateral because they are going to divulge information about how they structure their business of supplying sports games over the internet Please let me know if this is acceptable with a reasonable amount of change or if we should send them our draft thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM George Emerson on PM Please respond to To cc Subject nda Dave heres the NDA draft Pls send back any changes your legal has to make Thanks George George Emerson Sr VP Corporate Development Internet Sports Network Inc x wwwSportsRocketcom Enron Online NDA Aug doc

ndaa while since we have done one of these but heres a new one This will need to be bilateral because they are going to divulge information about how they structure their business of supplying sports games over the internet Please let me know if this is acceptable with a reasonable amount of change or if we should send them our draft thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM George Emerson on PM Please respond to To cc Subject nda Dave heres the NDA draft Pls send back any changes your legal has to make Thanks George George Emerson Sr VP Corporate Development Internet Sports Network Inc x wwwSportsRocketcom Enron Online NDA Aug doc

Weather Graphics ProposalWe have talked with this group about adding some of their weather maps to the site Can you please look at the attached proposal and agreement and pass along any comments or concerns Thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsLONECT on PM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Ian trategicWeathercom PM To Dave Samuels cc Nick Mooney Paul Goddard Subject Weather Graphics Proposal Hi Dave Heres the proposal we discussed which comes to month Normally we insist on a minimum of month but I feel there are many bigger things we can collaborate on down the road I havent included pricing for the satellite and radar imagery because its more costly I have fixed royalties that I have to pay on that and because of the complexity of having to track the number of users of Canadian radar On the North American satellite imagery the cost would be month on open access and month for restricted access no limits on the number of users For Canadian radar its available as a restrictedaccessonly package of three regional shots and a national image for month minimum for the first users then monthuser for users then for users for users and centsuser thereafter Simplicity is not a virtue on this one but these are restrictions imposed by Environment Canada Im afraid Please dont hesitate to contact me at should you have any questions or comments We look forward to serving your weatherinformation needs Best regards Ian Clarke Vice President WeatherMarketscom The commodity division of Strategic Weather Services See attached file EnronOnline Proposal doc EnronOnline Proposal doc

Re Weather Graphics ProposalAttached to this email is the standard terms and conditions from this content provider Please take a quick look and let us know if there are any major issues Dave Ian trategicWeathercom on PM To Dave Samuels cc Nick Mooney Paul Goddard Subject Weather Graphics Proposal Hi Dave Heres the proposal we discussed which comes to month Normally we insist on a minimum of month but I feel there are many bigger things we can collaborate on down the road I havent included pricing for the satellite and radar imagery because its more costly I have fixed royalties that I have to pay on that and because of the complexity of having to track the number of users of Canadian radar On the North American satellite imagery the cost would be month on open access and month for restricted access no limits on the number of users For Canadian radar its available as a restrictedaccessonly package of three regional shots and a national image for month minimum for the first users then monthuser for users then for users for users and centsuser thereafter Simplicity is not a virtue on this one but these are restrictions imposed by Environment Canada Im afraid Please dont hesitate to contact me at should you have any questions or comments We look forward to serving your weatherinformation needs Best regards Ian Clarke Vice President WeatherMarketscom The commodity division of Strategic Weather Services See attached file EnronOnline Proposal doc EnronOnline Proposal doc

ReutersHere is the latest agreement that we have received from Reuters I think we should have a meeting with George Webber to discuss this contract and agree a path forward Can you arrange this My day is currently very open Thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM Lynne Carithers on AM To cc Steve Pickett Beatriz G Roth Edith Mercer Subject Re Enron George apologize that I am introducing myself to you via email I am coordinating the efforts between Reuters and Enron on the current projects that are taking place Please review the Terms and Conditions document attached below from Reuters Legal regarding Reuters news via enrononlinecom I am available to coordinate a conference call with Beatriz Reuters Legal NY to discuss these changes Please let me know of your availability Thanks Lynne Carithers REUTERS AMERICA INC From Beatriz G Roth on PM EST To Lynne EUTERS cc Steve EUTERS Robert euters Subject Enron Lynne Attached is a new draft of the Agreement which you can forward to Enron If they want to discuss the changes that we did not make please arrange for a conference call with my assistant Edith Mercer Regards Bea See attached file EnronTCdoc Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronTCdoc

Reuters Confidentiality Agreement CommentsForwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM Lynne Carithers on AM To cc Steve Pickett Subject Re Enron Confidentiality Agreement Comments Dave Julie Rahil Reuters Legal NY has reviewed the Confidentiality Agreement for enrononlinecom that you submitted to me earlier this week and comments are noted below Over to you now for your legal to review and make appropriate changes as I do not have the Agreement in an electronic format Lynne From Stanford Lin on AM EST To Lynne EUTERS cc Subject Enron Confidentiality Agreement Comments Lynne Here are my comments on the agreement Change references from Reuters Group plc to Reuters America Inc Delete last sentence of Section or insert the words at Protected Partys expense after the text best efforts Insert the following at the end of the first sentence in Section and that is designated in writing as confidential proprietary or marked with words of like import or if orally conveyed Protected Party provides written notice describing in reasonable detail the portion of the oral communication that shall be deemed Confidential Information and delivers such writing to you within days of the oral conveyance Insert the following at the end of the last sentence in Section or d is developed by you independently of any Confidential Information it receives from the Protected Party Insert the following right before the last sentence in Section However the Protected Party represents and warrants to you that it has the right to make the disclosures permitted under this Agreement without violating any applicable law or regulation or any legally enforceable agreement to which it is a party In Section replace Money damages would with Money damages may Change both references of Texas to New York Delete the five sentences regarding arbitration Stanford Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd

RE Confidentiality Agtis the contact for Dow Jones Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM Beveridge Francesca on PM To Dave Samuels cc Subject RE Confidentiality Agt Hello David I have been out of the office at a meeting Sorry that I couldnt turn this around earlier today My contact in legal is Michele Leflar She can be reached at Her email address is I do not have Michelles fax number at this time but can get it to you tomorrow I have left a message for Michelle so that she will be expecting the call from your legal department I dont know if this can be resolved by AM central time but we can certainly try Looking forward to meeting you fb Original Message From Dave Samuels mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Beveridge Francesca Cc Tana Jones Subject Re Confidentiality Agt My lawyer wanted to speak with your lawyer to discuss these comments further and try to reach an agreement Can you please provide a name and phone and fax number so that they can speak Thanks Dave Beveridge Francesca on PM To cc Subject Confidentiality Agt Dear David I am forwarding to you the confidentiality agreement after my legal department made a few changes Please let me know if the changes are acceptable to you Best regards fb Enronblkdoc See attached file Enronblkdoc

Re REUTERS CONTRACTS Cc Thanks for the email I have spoken with our lawyer Mark Taylor and he is available at am Central time on Wednesday for a conference call Unfortunately he has a conflict at Please let me know if this is acceptable for the team at Reuters thanks Dave Lynne Carithers on PM To cc Phil Lynch Steve Pickett Stanford Lin James Garland Subject REUTERS CONTRACTS Dave per our last telephone discussion below are the standard Reuters Investor contracts After speaking with Stanford Lin he will strive to get the st draft with agreed upon revisions back to you by tomorrow afternoon I would like to set up the ReutersEnron conf call with both legal parties and me and if you feel appropriate with you for Wednesday at am central time I will forward the ATT conf call number and password to you tomorrow If there is a conflict with am central time please let me know of Enrons availability Stanford is available anytime from am central through the remainder of the day Thanks Lynne From Stanford Lin on PM EDT To cc Lynne EUTERS Subject Re ENRON UPDATE ON CONTRACTS Attached for reference purposes is a copy of the standard forms for Reuters Investor As mentioned we intend to insert within the Internet Services Agreement the relevant provisions from the Reuters Investor agreement particularly those sections related to quote information and datafeeds See attached file Tc MardocSee attached file SOF Mardoc Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd Tc Mardoc SOF Mardoc

EnrononlinecomReuters Agreement Cc the Reuters agreement that will be discussed tomorrow morning Thank you in advance for reviewing this so quickly Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM Stanford Lin on PM To cc Lynne Carithers Steve Pickett Phil Lynch James Garland Subject EnrononlinecomReuters Agreement Dave Attached for your review is the revised Terms Conditions to the Reuters Internet Services Agreement The agreement is redlined to reflect the text inserted as a result of the revised transaction ie inclusion of paid news and quotes Lynne and I are preparing the revised order forms for the news and quotes which will include the relevant pricing and billing information See attached file EnronInvestorTCdot Regards Stanford Lin Senior Legal Counsel Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronInvestorTCdot

exchange site licis another publication we are seeking to put on EnronOnline This party had their own contract so please take a look and lets discuss The deal is pretty simple We pay for a one year deal No user counts or fees or attrition Just K for unlimited use They publish monthly but have committed to going to twice a month thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM John Sodergreen on PM To cc Subject exchange site lic Hello DaveAgreement attached PDF file Have a look and give a ring tomorrow Many thanks Look forward to working with you Best John enronexchangelicPDF John R Sodergreen EditorinChief Scudder Publishing Group LLC wwwscudderpublishingcom The Desk Power Executive The Bandwidth Desk Energy eBusiness

comments on the Argus draftForwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM Abudi Zein on PM To David A Samuels cc Subject comments on the agreement draft David Thank you for sending the agreement draft on Friday Here are my notes after the first reading If you wish to discuss those further perhaps we can schedule a time on the phone Preamble We are a Delaware corporation Section Definition the attrition rate per your definition is diluted by the addition of new clients The attrition rate should calculated based on the number of existing clients at the beginning of the agreement without taking new clients into account Section Termination of the Agreement should be mutual and we cannot agree to keeping the Exclusivity at the same level through any renewal periods Section the definition of competitors is too broad We would like to see something that more tightly defines electronic trading of wholesale commodities We would like to retain the ability to offer these services in areas where Enron Online is not active such as supply chain systems and in the retail markets for large commercial and industrial concerns Also I am not sure whether this is intended but your reference to any Publication will give you exclusivity to ALL our publications for the fee set out in a That is not the intent Section b should be removed see comments on Section Section we cannot agree to letting Enron disclose the existence of this agreement without our consent Any disclosure about this agreement including the fact of its existence should be by mutual consent Section we need a mirror section indemnifying us against all and any claims against Enron Online This would be a showstopper for our lawyers Section I am not sure we have such an insurance but even if we did I am not sure why Enron is requiring this given that there is a clear indemnification Section a three days seems unduly short I would say days is more reasonable There are no fee payments in advance so I believe we can remove mention of fees being paid back Section were really not looking for a monetary commitment from Enron on helping us find illegal distribution What is important to us is that Enron has a contractual obligation to notify us immediately if it becomes aware of any breach of copyright or illegal distribution It would be good if that were written into this section Section typically we do not agree to arbitration clauses for the simple reason that these types disputes tend to end up in court anyway and then the two parties have spent money on arbitration and still have the legal costs ahead of them I believe we can live with this clause but it would be better if it were not there There might be a couple more points that come up from my colleagues or on a second reading but I believe these are the main sticking points at the moment Abudi Zein
Conf Call with Justin BoydLinklatersjust called and has arranged a conference call with outside counsel for CST today to discuss Euro Can either of you make it thanks Dave

Euro Cc recent discussions I wanted to provide more information about how we would plan to administer the contest around Euro We would restrict access to the contest to participants in countries that we have cleared The likely way that this will work will be to restrict access at the point of registration for the contest Heres how I think it would look to the user There would be a Euro icon on the EnronOnline quotes screen the main page of our system The user would click on this icon and a new browser window would open with the EnronOnlineSportscom home page This will contain schedules results player profiles etc It will also contain an icon for Minute Mania Contest When the user clicks on this icon they would then go to a page that describes at a high level what the contest is Pick times for events first goal etc and win prizes digital video camera etc We would also note here that the contest is only open to residents of UK Germany etc Click here to register The user will then go to a screen that has several input boxes that include Name contact details email phone user name for contest and country of residence The country of residence box would either be a drop down that only includes choices for the countries that are eligible or would allow the user to type their country If the user has the ability to type their country then the system would then have a verification process that rejects those that are ineligible to participate The order of priority for the countries where we have users is UK Germany Belgium Netherlands Switzerland Norway Sweden Finland Denmark Austria Italy Spain France Then there is also US largest customer base state by state differences Canada second largest group Australia Japan We also have users with guest IDs in Poland Portugal and Singapore we should confirm the laws here as well Please let me know if I can provide any further details thanks Dave

exchange site licis another publication we are seeking to put on EnronOnline This party had their own contract so please take a look and lets discuss The deal is pretty simple We pay for a one year deal No user counts or fees or attrition Just K for unlimited use They publish monthly but have committed to going to twice a month thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM John Sodergreen on PM To cc Subject exchange site lic Hello DaveAgreement attached PDF file Have a look and give a ring tomorrow Many thanks Look forward to working with you Best John enronexchangelicPDF John R Sodergreen EditorinChief Scudder Publishing Group LLC wwwscudderpublishingcom The Desk Power Executive The Bandwidth Desk Energy eBusiness

comments on the Argus draftForwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM Abudi Zein on PM To David A Samuels cc Subject comments on the agreement draft David Thank you for sending the agreement draft on Friday Here are my notes after the first reading If you wish to discuss those further perhaps we can schedule a time on the phone Preamble We are a Delaware corporation Section Definition the attrition rate per your definition is diluted by the addition of new clients The attrition rate should calculated based on the number of existing clients at the beginning of the agreement without taking new clients into account Section Termination of the Agreement should be mutual and we cannot agree to keeping the Exclusivity at the same level through any renewal periods Section the definition of competitors is too broad We would like to see something that more tightly defines electronic trading of wholesale commodities We would like to retain the ability to offer these services in areas where Enron Online is not active such as supply chain systems and in the retail markets for large commercial and industrial concerns Also I am not sure whether this is intended but your reference to any Publication will give you exclusivity to ALL our publications for the fee set out in a That is not the intent Section b should be removed see comments on Section Section we cannot agree to letting Enron disclose the existence of this agreement without our consent Any disclosure about this agreement including the fact of its existence should be by mutual consent Section we need a mirror section indemnifying us against all and any claims against Enron Online This would be a showstopper for our lawyers Section I am not sure we have such an insurance but even if we did I am not sure why Enron is requiring this given that there is a clear indemnification Section a three days seems unduly short I would say days is more reasonable There are no fee payments in advance so I believe we can remove mention of fees being paid back Section were really not looking for a monetary commitment from Enron on helping us find illegal distribution What is important to us is that Enron has a contractual obligation to notify us immediately if it becomes aware of any breach of copyright or illegal distribution It would be good if that were written into this section Section typically we do not agree to arbitration clauses for the simple reason that these types disputes tend to end up in court anyway and then the two parties have spent money on arbitration and still have the legal costs ahead of them I believe we can live with this clause but it would be better if it were not there There might be a couple more points that come up from my colleagues or on a second reading but I believe these are the main sticking points at the moment Abudi Zein

Weather Graphics ProposalWe have talked with this group about adding some of their weather maps to the site Can you please look at the attached proposal and agreement and pass along any comments or concerns Thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsLONECT on PM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Ian trategicWeathercom PM To Dave Samuels cc Nick Mooney Paul Goddard Subject Weather Graphics Proposal Hi Dave Heres the proposal we discussed which comes to month Normally we insist on a minimum of month but I feel there are many bigger things we can collaborate on down the road I havent included pricing for the satellite and radar imagery because its more costly I have fixed royalties that I have to pay on that and because of the complexity of having to track the number of users of Canadian radar On the North American satellite imagery the cost would be month on open access and month for restricted access no limits on the number of users For Canadian radar its available as a restrictedaccessonly package of three regional shots and a national image for month minimum for the first users then monthuser for users then for users for users and centsuser thereafter Simplicity is not a virtue on this one but these are restrictions imposed by Environment Canada Im afraid Please dont hesitate to contact me at should you have any questions or comments We look forward to serving your weatherinformation needs Best regards Ian Clarke Vice President WeatherMarketscom The commodity division of Strategic Weather Services See attached file EnronOnline Proposal doc EnronOnline Proposal doc

Re Weather Graphics ProposalAttached to this email is the standard terms and conditions from this content provider Please take a quick look and let us know if there are any major issues Dave Ian trategicWeathercom on PM To Dave Samuels cc Nick Mooney Paul Goddard Subject Weather Graphics Proposal Hi Dave Heres the proposal we discussed which comes to month Normally we insist on a minimum of month but I feel there are many bigger things we can collaborate on down the road I havent included pricing for the satellite and radar imagery because its more costly I have fixed royalties that I have to pay on that and because of the complexity of having to track the number of users of Canadian radar On the North American satellite imagery the cost would be month on open access and month for restricted access no limits on the number of users For Canadian radar its available as a restrictedaccessonly package of three regional shots and a national image for month minimum for the first users then monthuser for users then for users for users and centsuser thereafter Simplicity is not a virtue on this one but these are restrictions imposed by Environment Canada Im afraid Please dont hesitate to contact me at should you have any questions or comments We look forward to serving your weatherinformation needs Best regards Ian Clarke Vice President WeatherMarketscom The commodity division of Strategic Weather Services See attached file EnronOnline Proposal doc EnronOnline Proposal doc

ReutersHere is the latest agreement that we have received from Reuters I think we should have a meeting with George Webber to discuss this contract and agree a path forward Can you arrange this My day is currently very open Thanks Dave Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM Lynne Carithers on AM To cc Steve Pickett Beatriz G Roth Edith Mercer Subject Re Enron George apologize that I am introducing myself to you via email I am coordinating the efforts between Reuters and Enron on the current projects that are taking place Please review the Terms and Conditions document attached below from Reuters Legal regarding Reuters news via enrononlinecom I am available to coordinate a conference call with Beatriz Reuters Legal NY to discuss these changes Please let me know of your availability Thanks Lynne Carithers REUTERS AMERICA INC From Beatriz G Roth on PM EST To Lynne EUTERS cc Steve EUTERS Robert euters Subject Enron Lynne Attached is a new draft of the Agreement which you can forward to Enron If they want to discuss the changes that we did not make please arrange for a conference call with my assistant Edith Mercer Regards Bea See attached file EnronTCdoc Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd EnronTCdoc

RE Confidentiality Agtis the contact for Dow Jones Forwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on PM Beveridge Francesca on PM To Dave Samuels cc Subject RE Confidentiality Agt Hello David I have been out of the office at a meeting Sorry that I couldnt turn this around earlier today My contact in legal is Michele Leflar She can be reached at Her email address is I do not have Michelles fax number at this time but can get it to you tomorrow I have left a message for Michelle so that she will be expecting the call from your legal department I dont know if this can be resolved by AM central time but we can certainly try Looking forward to meeting you fb Original Message From Dave Samuels mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Beveridge Francesca Cc Tana Jones Subject Re Confidentiality Agt My lawyer wanted to speak with your lawyer to discuss these comments further and try to reach an agreement Can you please provide a name and phone and fax number so that they can speak Thanks Dave Beveridge Francesca on PM To cc Subject Confidentiality Agt Dear David I am forwarding to you the confidentiality agreement after my legal department made a few changes Please let me know if the changes are acceptable to you Best regards fb Enronblkdoc See attached file Enronblkdoc

Re REUTERS CONTRACTS Cc Thanks for the email I have spoken with our lawyer Mark Taylor and he is available at am Central time on Wednesday for a conference call Unfortunately he has a conflict at Please let me know if this is acceptable for the team at Reuters thanks Dave Lynne Carithers on PM To cc Phil Lynch Steve Pickett Stanford Lin James Garland Subject REUTERS CONTRACTS Dave per our last telephone discussion below are the standard Reuters Investor contracts After speaking with Stanford Lin he will strive to get the st draft with agreed upon revisions back to you by tomorrow afternoon I would like to set up the ReutersEnron conf call with both legal parties and me and if you feel appropriate with you for Wednesday at am central time I will forward the ATT conf call number and password to you tomorrow If there is a conflict with am central time please let me know of Enrons availability Stanford is available anytime from am central through the remainder of the day Thanks Lynne From Stanford Lin on PM EDT To cc Lynne EUTERS Subject Re ENRON UPDATE ON CONTRACTS Attached for reference purposes is a copy of the standard forms for Reuters Investor As mentioned we intend to insert within the Internet Services Agreement the relevant provisions from the Reuters Investor agreement particularly those sections related to quote information and datafeeds See attached file Tc MardocSee attached file SOF Mardoc Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd Tc Mardoc SOF Mardoc

Reuters Confidentiality Agreement CommentsForwarded by Dave SamuelsHOUECT on AM Lynne Carithers on AM To cc Steve Pickett Subject Re Enron Confidentiality Agreement Comments Dave Julie Rahil Reuters Legal NY has reviewed the Confidentiality Agreement for enrononlinecom that you submitted to me earlier this week and comments are noted below Over to you now for your legal to review and make appropriate changes as I do not have the Agreement in an electronic format Lynne From Stanford Lin on AM EST To Lynne EUTERS cc Subject Enron Confidentiality Agreement Comments Lynne Here are my comments on the agreement Change references from Reuters Group plc to Reuters America Inc Delete last sentence of Section or insert the words at Protected Partys expense after the text best efforts Insert the following at the end of the first sentence in Section and that is designated in writing as confidential proprietary or marked with words of like import or if orally conveyed Protected Party provides written notice describing in reasonable detail the portion of the oral communication that shall be deemed Confidential Information and delivers such writing to you within days of the oral conveyance Insert the following at the end of the last sentence in Section or d is developed by you independently of any Confidential Information it receives from the Protected Party Insert the following right before the last sentence in Section However the Protected Party represents and warrants to you that it has the right to make the disclosures permitted under this Agreement without violating any applicable law or regulation or any legally enforceable agreement to which it is a party In Section replace Money damages would with Money damages may Change both references of Texas to New York Delete the five sentences regarding arbitration Stanford Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd

Re REUTERS CONTRACTS Cc Thanks for the email I have spoken with our lawyer Mark Taylor and he is available at am Central time on Wednesday for a conference call Unfortunately he has a conflict at Please let me know if this is acceptable for the team at Reuters thanks Dave Lynne Carithers on PM To cc Phil Lynch Steve Pickett Stanford Lin James Garland Subject REUTERS CONTRACTS Dave per our last telephone discussion below are the standard Reuters Investor contracts After speaking with Stanford Lin he will strive to get the st draft with agreed upon revisions back to you by tomorrow afternoon I would like to set up the ReutersEnron conf call with both legal parties and me and if you feel appropriate with you for Wednesday at am central time I will forward the ATT conf call number and password to you tomorrow If there is a conflict with am central time please let me know of Enrons availability Stanford is available anytime from am central through the remainder of the day Thanks Lynne From Stanford Lin on PM EDT To cc Lynne EUTERS Subject Re ENRON UPDATE ON CONTRACTS Attached for reference purposes is a copy of the standard forms for Reuters Investor As mentioned we intend to insert within the Internet Services Agreement the relevant provisions from the Reuters Investor agreement particularly those sections related to quote information and datafeeds See attached file Tc MardocSee attached file SOF Mardoc Visit our Internet site at Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Reuters Ltd Tc Mardoc SOF Mardoc
